thread.title: Is Holly Willoughy set to join Hollyoaks? | Metro News
thread.title_full: Is Holly Willoughy set to join Hollyoaks? | Metro News

author: Duncan Lindsay For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Is Holly Willoughy set to join Hollyoaks? | Metro News
text:
Duncan Lindsay for Metro.co.uk Tuesday 28 Feb 2017 11:12 am (Picture: REX/Lime Pictures) 
She could put the Holly in Hollyoaks – well , alongside Holly Cunningham of course. This Morning presenter Holly Willoughby has declared that she would be very much up for a role in the soap and even has her mind set on what her scandalous storyline could be. 
Having revealed that she wants to join a soap, she liaised with Emmerdale writer and daytime TV colleague Sharon Marshall, who reckons she would be a great fit for the Channel 4 show. over to you then, Hollyoaks! 
Speaking to The Sun , Holly said: ‘I’d love to do soaps. I did speak to This Morning’s soap expert the other day because she writes for Emmerdale and I said, “What would you cast me in?” and she said she would cast me in Hollyoaks as the teacher who has an affair with one of her pupils. (Picture: ITV/REX) 
Becca and Justin mark two? Well, it would be dramatic – and we’d enjoy seeing a fierce clash between Holly and headteacher Sally St Claire.
